'Emperor's Holidays' () is a 2015 Chinese family film directed by Wang Yuelun. The film was released on February 19, 2015.
Cast
* Guo Tao
* Jimmy Lin
* Zhang Liang
* Wang Yuelun
* Tian Liang
* Sung Dong-il
* Kim Jeong-hoon
* Jang Gwang

* Mike Sui
